product_name: TYR Durafast Splice Maxfit Swimsuit - Women's
long_description: The TYR Durafast Splice Maxfit women's swimsuit is fast enough for competition and tough enough for training, ensuring lasting performance. Durafast(TM) polyester offers chlorine-proof, colorfast and sun-resistant performance to ensure lasting use; 4-way stretch provides a comfortable fit. Fabric features UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Wide straps maximize support.
short_description: The TYR Durafast Splice Maxfit women's swimsuit is fast enough for competition and tough enough for training, ensuring lasting performance.
